🧮 Problem 1: Sample Math Problem

Taro puts apples into three boxes.
The boxes contain 2, 4, and 5 apples respectively.
How many apples are there in total?

\[2 + 4 + 5 = ?\]

📝 Hint

  • Add the number of apples in each box.
  • Simple addition!
